strings.title: Candy Blast
strings.instructions1: Tap on candies to explode them

fields.name: Game Title
fields.description: The title that is displayed in the start menu

fields.name: Title Font
fields.description: Google fonts link to font to use in the TITLE ONLY

fields.name: Font Family
fields.description: Google fonts link to font to use in the game

fields.name: High Score Gained Text
fields.description: When you get a new high score

fields.name: Miss Text
fields.description: Splash text when you miss a shot

fields.name: Max Lives
fields.description: How many lives you initially have (Integer)

fields.name: Score Gain
fields.description: How much score you get for each bubble popped (Integer)

fields.name: Starting Ducks
fields.description: How many ducks spawn at the beginning (Integer)

fields.name: Starting Bullets
fields.description: How many bullets play will have at the beginning (Integer)

fields.name: Enable E-Mail Input
fields.description: Enable/Disable E-Mail input while submitting score.

fields.name: Ducks Inscrease per Round
fields.description: How much ducks will be added on next Round.

fields.name: Time elapsed before ducks enter in Alert Mode
fields.description: Enter the time in Milliseconds. Alert mode is just before the ducks can escape.

fields.name: Time elapsed after ducks enter in Alert Mode and can really escape
fields.description: Enter the time in Milliseconds. When a duck scape, the user looses one life

fields.name: Round Text
fields.description: Splash text when you pass a Round.

fields.name: Congratulations Text
fields.description: Splash text when you pass a Round with great performance.
